data.title: Fix RA Aftermath installer metadata on Linux
data.body: This fixes the installation of RA Aftermath files from disk on Linux, which was broken because of filename case-sensitivity.

data.title: Fixes duplicate Targetable value on ^Ammobox
Fix Client tooltip crash in Lobby
data.body:
Fixes #13731 

As I checked the combination I changed it to `widget.IsVisible() + tooltipContainer.BeforeRender` in #13365 is standard. It failed on line `if (admin.IsVisible())`. I tried to add the check to admin.IsVisible which avoided the crash but the tooltip of disconnected player stayed visible until mouse move so I added the early return as suggested by @pchote in #13731 .

data.title: Allow disabling Burst reset & tweak TS missile trails

milestone.title: Tiberian Sun Public Alpha
milestone.description: An incomplete list of blockers for a public alpha release.

data.body:
Already resetting Bursts if ticksSinceLastShot reached ReloadDelay broke the alternating between muzzle offsets on some TS weapons, and might do the same for some 3rd-party mods.

Additionally, this PR tweaks TS missile trails a little, reducing the delay between trail spawn and making the trail anim use a palette with alpha transparency, bringing both aspects closer to the original.

data.title: HealthPercentageDamageWarhead in't compatible with hitshapes.
TS Civilian Array is missing idle animations

milestone.title: Tiberian Sun Public Alpha
milestone.description: An incomplete list of blockers for a public alpha release.

data.body: They were not displaying in the original game either, but that was a bug, not intentional.

data.title: Groups of helicopters do not reload when sent to helipad
data.body:
Hello,

After running out of ammo, I try to send a group of helicopters to a helipad to reload. The entire group will return to the helipad, but only one of them will reload. The rest will idle. Expected behavior: each helicopter takes turns using the helipad to reload.

Thanks!

data.title: Move activity now uses ChildActivity
data.body:
Removing THE obstacle for waypoint visualization PR #13336.

In line 245, the tick runs the child activity before returning. I commented why. However, what I didn't write there is that it changes the behavior when the move order has first ticked to that part. It used to return MoveFirstHalf and not tick it.

I also tried to make Move activity more understandable but, I failed because I couldn't understand Move.cs. I am not even 50% sure what MoveFirstHalf and MoveSecondHalf are. No comments and not self-explanatory :( I'll just make minimal changes.

data.title: Helicopter unit's can't move in Z direction while attacking
data.body:
Cause: Only one activity runs at a time with the current code. (Although multiple children activity is possible in current system)

I have a slow moving airborne aircraft carrier. When it is produced from the airfield, it moves in Z direction, slowly rising to its cruising altitude. When it finds an attackable target while doing Z move, it will stop the Z move and attack target. It will stay below cruising height until it is told to move.

data.title: Investigate refactoring Aircraft
data.body:
By either splitting it into Plane and Helicopter again, or alternatively splitting all the movement logic into separate locomotor trait(s).

In its current form, it seems `Aircraft` and its bulk of related activities is too monolithic and complicated to be properly maintainable, judging by all the issues we've had and still have.

Only sharing truly common elements and otherwise making helicopter/plane logic more clearly separated  and modular would allow for easier debugging and 3rd-party mod customization.

data.title: Make WithSpriteBody and -Turret always use CancelCustomAnimation() after custom anim
data.body:
On bleed, custom animations that don't queue `CancelCustomAnimation()` will break the default sequence loop.

Closes #13742.

data.title: Add hotkeys for spectators to toggle players' vision
data.body:
Self-explanatory. 
Now there are hotkeys for "All players" and "Disable shroud". Numeric keys could be used to switch to a specific player.

data.title: Expand statistics control for spectators
data.body:
Two small additions that looks easy to implement.
a) make statistics screen hotkey (default F1) toggle instead of just pop up statistics so that you can open/close it instead of just open.
b) add hotkeys for opening (toggling) statistics tabs directly (F2 - Economy, F3 - production, F4 - combat f.e.)

data.title: WithMakeAnimation prevents idle animation from playing
data.body:
https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/13737 : Found while making this PR for D2K Thumper.

The following code is supposed to show a deploy animation on deploy then stay in looping thump sequence.

	WithInfantryBody:
		RequiresCondition: undeployed
	WithSpriteBody@DEPLOYED:
		Sequence: thump
		RequiresCondition: !undeployed
	WithMakeAnimation@DEPLOYING:
		Sequence: deploy
	WithIdleOverlay@DEPLOYED:
		Sequence: thump-sand
		RequiresCondition: deployed

It doesn't work. WithMakeAnimation seems to occupy the body and thump shows only once. If I comment WithMakeAnimation out, the idle animation loops successfully.

	WithInfantryBody:
		RequiresCondition: undeployed
	WithMakeAnimation@DEPLOYING:
		Sequence: deploy
	WithSpriteBody@DEPLOYING:
		Sequence: thump
		RequiresCondition: !deployed && !undeployed
	WithSpriteBody@DEPLOYED:
		Sequence: thump
		RequiresCondition: deployed
	WithIdleOverlay@DEPLOYED:
		Sequence: thump-sand
		RequiresCondition: deployed

A walkaround is to have separate WithSpriteBody traits for deployed and deploying states.

data.title: Missions missing
data.body: On both RA and TD it seems im missing several (almost half Id say) of the missions in the mission list. It also seems theres "tabs" but Im unable to click on them.

data.title: Fix SpawnActorPower not playing launch sounds
data.body:
Fixes #13735.

Simple and obvious enough to go into stable, I think.

data.title: HTTP/S Webhook for Servers
data.body:
This request is for mainly **Servers** or more specifically **Dedicated Servers**.

**The Request**
It would be great if when a game is won it would sent a request to an endpoint if available and defined in some sort of configuration which could be used to track individual games scores and winners.

I believe this could be used for analytical purposes but also for OpenRA tournaments in which the winners are automatically recorded.

**Examples of Usage**

- Being able to track which factions won the most games to see if there is an offset of balance in the game.
- Being able to track user's score for OpenRA tournaments and leaderboards.

**Issues**
- Authentication, and how each player would verify they are the real player.

data.title: D2K Thumper deploy animation fix
data.body:
Thumper's deploy animation is broken for very long. However, since Thumper is the ONLY example of deploying infantry in the bundled mods, it must be corrected, once and for all.

5 frames of deploy animation are rather short. I recommend making it 20 for test purpose.

data.title: ADD GrantConditionOnAttack Trait
data.body:
Useful for making Gattling weapons (Yuri's Revenge and C&C Generals) or Boris (RA2) / Natasha (RA3) call for airstrike.

Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fQn0rspPH3s

data.title: SpawnActorPower: Sound Bug
data.body:
When using **SpawnActorPower:** for mods etc.

On current release build, 

Both:

`LaunchSound:`  and `LaunchSpeechNotification:`

Fail to function when they are used.

`DeploySound:`  works, but this is also heard by all players. (I imagine thats intentional?)
